name: ExamplePersona
description: Template persona for AI video generation - replace with your own

appearance.facial_features: Authentic human features captured in video embeddings
appearance.expressions: 5 distinct emotional states: angry, inspired, neutral, reflective, relief

emotional_range.angry: Intense emotions, dramatic tension, strong reactions
emotional_range.neutral: Calm, natural expression, everyday scenarios, baseline

video_descriptions.example_angry.mp4: Person expressing anger - intense facial expressions, dramatic body language
video_descriptions.example_inspired.mp4: Person showing inspiration and excitement - bright expressions, animated gestures
video_descriptions.example_neutral.mp4: Person in neutral state - natural baseline expression and posture
video_descriptions.example_reflective.mp4: Person in thoughtful mode - contemplative expression, introspective demeanor
video_descriptions.example_relief.mp4: Person expressing relief and satisfaction - peaceful, content expressions
